LanguageData.AA_AteSuperAwfulMeal.stages.0.label: ate incredibly awful meal
LanguageData.AA_AteSuperAwfulMeal.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat something that was processed in the guts of a biomechanical abomination. I haven't eaten a more disgusting meal in my whole life.
LanguageData.AA_AteHorribleRot.stages.0.label: ate fermented rotting vegetation
LanguageData.AA_AteHorribleRot.stages.0.description: I had to scavenge fermented rotting vegetation to survive. This was worse than eating a corpse. The end is near.
LanguageData.AA_UncomfortablyHot.stages.0.label: ate terrible wasp eggs
LanguageData.AA_UncomfortablyHot.stages.0.description: I ate food with terrible wasp eggs. They burned my mouth and the burning sensation doesn't go away!.
LanguageData.AA_BeenPsionicallyNuzzled.stages.0.label: psionically nuzzled
LanguageData.AA_BeenPsionicallyNuzzled.stages.0.descr: That pretty fox sure seems to know how to make you feel loved...
LanguageData.AA_Disgust.stages.0.label: disgusting creature
LanguageData.AA_Disgust.stages.0.description: I witnessed a revolting giant slug reeking of the stench of corpse bile. I want to puke.
